sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Approvers can read records they are approving. g_approval_form_request is set in the approval_summarizer_default UI Macro.</description><name>problem</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[var transaction = GlideTransaction.get();
(transaction.getRequestParameter("sysparm_record_target") == "sysapproval_approver") || (typeof g_approval_form_request != "undefined" && g_approval_form_request == true);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-09-14 16:38:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>69ebb1225f011000b12e3572f2b477c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>problem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">ecbdaad7dda5a000a7e1d1303d199588</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>true</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_69ebb1225f011000b12e3572f2b477c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tdAdams</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-13 20:12:36</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
